verse.lines:
C
Jesus You are mercy
Jesus You are justice
Jesus You are worthy

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
You died alone to save me
You rose so You could raise me
You did this all to make me
A chosen child of God

verse.name: c1b

For with Your blood
You purchased us for God
Jesus You are worthy
That is what You are

verse.name: b1a
verse.lines:
Perfect sacrifice
Crushed by God for us
Bearing in Your hurt
All that I deserve

verse.name: b1b
verse.lines:
Misjudged for my misdeeds
You Suffered silently
The only guiltless man
In all of history
